channel.title: Photographies on Mike Treglia
channel.description: Recent content in Photographies on Mike Treglia

item.title: Photography
item.description: ‹ › × Photography is a hobby and a passion for me. I try to take my camera on various travels, hikes, and when I get time with my family (especially for photos of the nephew and the dog). Here is a selection of some of my favorites, hosted via the open source blueimp gallery scripts, and feel free to check out my Instagram feed.
